about.title: About
about.tagline: Short intro about Parla Information Technologies and our value proposition.

section1.title: Who We Are
section1.p: Parla Information Technologies is a team of experienced professionals delivering SAP-based solutions. We adopt sustainable and scalable approaches while digitizing our clients' processes.

section2.title: What We Do
section2.p: We analyze your business processes and design end-to-end solutions using appropriate SAP modules and integrations. We provide migration, license management and post-go-live support services.

section3.title: Our Values
section3.p: Customer-centricity, quality and transparent communication are our core values. We aim to build long-term partnerships in every project.
section3.note: You can include client references or short case studies here if you like.

install.title: SAP Implementation & Migration
install.intro: We provide end-to-end consultancy from the initial transition to SAP to migrating your existing system to S/4HANA, covering license selection, technical setup, and go-live.

features.title: SAP R/3 License
features.desc: Determining the appropriate SAP R/3 license structure for your current needs and managing the licensing process.

features.title: S/4HANA License
features.desc: Selecting license types suitable for the S/4HANA transition roadmap and preparing for the conversion process.

features.title: Requirement & User Type Analysis
features.desc: Identifying the most suitable licenses, modules, and user types based on your company structure, user count, and processes.

features.title: Cloud ERP Subscription
features.desc: Consultancy on subscription models, cost structures, and transition scenarios for cloud-based SAP ERP solutions.

features.title: BTP Service Packages
features.desc: Designing custom service packages on SAP BTP for your integration, custom development, and reporting needs.

features.title: Maintenance & Renewal Management
features.desc: Systematically tracking and managing license maintenance agreements, renewal dates, and version upgrades.

consulting.title: SAP Consulting and Support
consulting.intro: We offer consultancy services that analyze your existing SAP system, improve your processes, add new functionalities, and provide continuous support for your daily operations.

features.title: Custom Development Services
features.desc: We tailor your SAP processes to your needs by developing custom reports, screens, integrations, and automations for your company.

features.title: SAP Support Services
features.desc: We provide end-to-end support and guidance for errors, performance issues, and user requests you encounter in the live system.

features.title: Custom SAP Solution Implementation (FI/CO/TRM etc.)
features.desc: We provide end-to-end implementation, customization, testing, and go-live consultancy for Finance (FI/CO), Treasury and Risk Management (TRM), and other modules.
